archimate:Driver.name: Speed
archimate:Driver.documentation: The "speed" driver emphasizes the importance of rapid response, quick decision-making, and fast execution within an organization. It guides strategies and actions towards accelerating processes, reducing time-to-market, and enhancing agility. This driver is crucial in dynamic and competitive environments where being first or fast can offer a significant advantage. It influences the adoption of technologies and methodologies that enable quicker delivery of products and services, rapid adaptation to market changes, and efficient operational tempo. The focus on speed often leads to prioritizing initiatives that promise to enhance responsiveness and reduce delays.
